item.title: Understanding gasless transactions
item.description: In an ideal world, web3 experiences should feel as seamless as web2. One of the first UX challenges for new web3 users is understanding the concept of gas. Here, we’ll explore ways to abstract gas costs from users and the technical methods to achieve this. Someone has to pay gas #Gas is essentially a fee for using blockchain resources and serves as a safeguard against spam. In Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM), the gas payer is always the “from” address in a typical EIP-1559 transaction.
